name: Harambe's Toolkit
description: Quickly share current tab to ARCHIVE.IS, ARCHIVE.TODAY, ARCHIVE.ORG, DISSENTER, or TWITTER with the lightweight Harambe's Toolkit (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/harambes-toolkit/ or https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/hmkpigohjcnjmfnbbmmjkjphemofibdd)
